mapper.select: SELECT wf.date, wf.hour, wf.temp, wf.tmx, wf.tmn, wf.sky, wf.pop, w.grid_x, w.grid_y FROM administrative_area_info w INNER JOIN weather_forecast wf ON w.area_cd = wf.area_cd WHERE w.grid_x = #{grid_x} AND w.grid_y =#{grid_y} AND wf.date = CURDATE() AND wf.hour =12 LIMIT 1 ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weather_forecast (area_cd, date, hour, temp, tmx, tmn, sky, pty, wf_kor, wf_en, pop, r12, s12, ws, wd, wd_kor, wd_en, reh, r06, s06, reg_date) VALUES (#{areaCd}, DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(),INTERVAL +#{day} day), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{hour}, #{temp}, #{tmx}, #{tmn}, #{sky}, #{pty}, #{wfKor}, #{wfEn}, #{pop}, #{r12}, #{s12}, #{ws}, #{wd}, #{wdKor}, #{wdEn}, #{reh}, #{r06}, #{s06}, now() )
